headline: IBM Valuation in Focus as Quantum Advantage Race Heats Up in 2025
summary: Wondering what to make of International Business Machines right now? You are not alone. Whether you already hold some shares or are just circling the IBM story, the stock’s recent run is enough to catch anyone’s attention. So far this year, IBM is up an impressive 27.9%, with the past month alone delivering a 5.6% gain. Stretch that out to three and five years and we are looking at a staggering 138.0% and 225.6% return, respectively. Clearly, something has been working in Big Blue's...

headline: Busy week of earnings ahead: Tesla, Intel, Coca-Cola, Netflix
summary: Earnings season intensifies this week with Tesla (TSLA) reporting on Wednesday. However, Moneta's Aoifinn Devitt believes just as much attention needs to be paid to the likes of Intel (INTC) and IBM (IBM) as well as consumer sentiment stocks like Coca-Cola (KO) and Netflix (NFLX). For more live coverage of markets watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and head to Yahoo Finance.
